address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x58`.

*See also: [SGP30 CO₂ and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sgp30.html#configuration-variables)*

baseline.docs:
The block containing baselines for calibration purposes. See [Calibrating Baseline](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sgp30.html#sgp30-calibrating) for more info.
  * **eco2_baseline** (**Required**, int): The eCO2 baseline for calibration purposes. After OTA, this value is used to calibrate the sensor.
  
  * **tvoc_baseline** (**Required**, int): The TVOC baseline for calibration purposes. After OTA, this value is used to calibrate the sensor.
  
  

*See also: [SGP30 CO₂ and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sgp30.html#configuration-variables)*

compensation.docs:
The block containing sensors used for compensation. Both values must be supplied in order to be able to generate the absolute humidity to be reported to the sensor.
  * **temperature_source** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Give an external temperature sensor ID here. The data must be in Celsius. This can improve the sensor’s internal calculations.
  
  * **humidity_source** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Give an external relative humidity sensor ID here. This can improve the sensor’s internal calculations.
  
  

*See also: [SGP30 CO₂ and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sgp30.html#configuration-variables)*
